Interface CloneMapping

Deprecated. 

public interface CloneMapping

An interface that represents mapping data.

getValueMapList

java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getValueMapList(java.lang.String datatypename)
                                                                                 throws MappingException
Deprecated. 
Get a list of map with datatypeField as key, data fetched value from source data

For example: Class Act { ... SET id ... }

Class II { ... UID root() ST extension() BL displayable ... }

Mapping file will be: ... ... ... ...

So I am going to create a list with map.put<"root", rootValue>, map.put<"extension", extensionValue> map.put<"translation", anotherMap> then I create a list of map if needed because of SET.

Parameters:
datatypename -
Returns:
Throws:
MappingException

Parameters:
datatypename -
Returns:
subClass name if specified

getDataTypeNames

java.lang.String[] getDataTypeNames()
Deprecated. 

Get all list of all the datatypesnames that there are mappings for, for example ["classcode", "code", "id"].

Returns:
An array of datatypenames.

getValue

java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String datatypename,
                          java.lang.String attribute,
                          int datatypenum)
                          throws MappingException
Deprecated. 

Fetch the actual data for this datatype and attribute. A third attribute is needed becuase there could be more than one datatype mappings per clone. For example, "id" is defined as a SET.

Parameters:
datatypename - For example "classcode".
attribute - For example "codeSystemVersion".
datatypenum - Count begins a zero.
Returns:
Throws:
MappingException - if an error is encountered with the datasource
